relations.sentence: on a dark and rainy day in the fall of nineteen eighty six hello crafts learn from a private investigator that her husband was having an affair.

I first met hello crafts in the fall of nineteen eighty six she came in to see me and was discussing the possibility of a divorce from her husband she was very concerned about what was happening at that time.

and she'd had enough when Hella crap tired detective Keith Mayo she provided an important lead how long distance number she saw on the phone bills but didn't recognize I met with her several days after we had caught a Richard with his girlfriend and there were many photos of affection between the two her.
